bug report.summary: Clicking the 'A to Z' filter button on the main page of the app causes random list filtering
step_to_reproduce: 2. Create 15 lists that will start respectively (A, a, D, 3, :, U, u, W, w, 5, @, Ї, ї, -, d)
3. On the main page of the application, click on the 'A to Z' filter button
expected_result: The lists are sorted in order: symbols, numbers, Latin letters (upper case first), Cyrillic letters (upper case first)
The correct order is: (-, :, @, 3, 5, A, a, D, d, U, u, Ї, ї, W, w)
bug report.author: Alona Bohdanets
